name: Gatherer's Exterior RPG Pack
description:
Exterior Tileset, Tools, and Object Pack!

  • 4 Varied Environments for a Gathering, Survival, or RPG Style Game
  • 105+ Unique Objects for Your Game

Purchase includes access to all future pack updates

Starter pack for a survival / gathering RPG game. Assets and tilesets are based around a 16x16 pixel grid. Includes tools for harvesting lumber, gold, and stone from the environment. You can connect different environment zones with bridges and floating rafts.

Built using the Zughy 32 color palette 

Asset License

✔️ You can :

  • Use the assets for non-commercial AND commercial project. 
  • Adapt and/or modify the assets to match your project.

❌ You can NOT :

  • Distribute or sell those assets directly (even modified).
  • Claim the asset yours.
